entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as a person who pretended that he was going to have a baby with Merope. He left her while she was still pregnant.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is mentioned as a person who was deeply in love with Tom Riddle and gave him a love potion to make him fall in love with her. She stopped giving him the potion when she thought he would stay for the baby's sake.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who asked Dumbledore why the love potion stopped working.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who explained to Harry why the love potion stopped working.

entities.name: house of gaunt
entities.description: The House of Gaunt is mentioned as a family that Tom Riddle was a part of.

entities.name: baby
entities.description: The baby is mentioned as the child born to Merope and Tom Riddle.
